==================
 python-rapidjson
==================

----------------------------------
Python 3 wrapper around RapidJSON_
----------------------------------

This module implements a Python 3 wrapper around RapidJSON_, which is an extremely fast C++
JSON_ serialization library.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   quickstart
   benchmarks
   api

.. _RapidJSON: https://github.com/miloyip/rapidjson
.. _JSON: http://json.org/
